Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.apache.beam.runners.dataflow.options.DataflowWorkerLoggingOptions
    This interface will no longer be the source of truth for worker logging configuration once jobs are executed using a dedicated SDK harness instead of user code being co-located alongside Dataflow worker code. Please set the option below and also the corresponding option within SdkHarnessOptions to ensure forward compatibility.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.fn.stream.DataStreams.OutputChunkConsumer
    Used as a temporary placeholder until implementation of DataStreams.outbound(OutputChunkConsumer).
    org.apache.beam.sdk.testing.StreamingIT
    tests which use unbounded PCollections should be in the category UsesUnboundedPCollections. Beyond that, it is up to the runner and test configuration to decide whether to run in streaming mode.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.Coder.Context
    To implement a coder, do not use any Coder.Context. Just implement only those abstract methods which do not accept a Coder.Context and leave the default implementations for methods accepting a Coder.Context.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.Combine.SimpleCombineFn
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.Reshuffle
    this transform's intended side effects are not portable; it will likely be removed
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.windowing.ReshuffleTrigger
    The intended side effect of Reshuffle is not portable; it will likely be removed
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.Top.Largest
    use Top.Natural instead
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.Top.Smallest
    use Top.Reversed instead
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.CompressedSource.CompressionMode
    Use Compression instead
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.FileBasedSink.CompressionType
    use Compression.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.TextIO.CompressionType
    Use Compression.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.TFRecordIO.CompressionType
    Use Compression.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.xml.XmlIO.Read.CompressionType
    Use Compression instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.gcp.pubsub.PubsubIO.PubsubSubscription.asV1Beta1Path()
    the v1beta1 API for Cloud Pub/Sub is deprecated.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.gcp.pubsub.PubsubIO.PubsubTopic.asV1Beta1Path()
    the v1beta1 API for Cloud Pub/Sub is deprecated.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.gcp.pubsub.PubsubIO.PubsubSubscription.asV1Beta2Path()
    the v1beta2 API for Cloud Pub/Sub is deprecated.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.gcp.pubsub.PubsubIO.PubsubTopic.asV1Beta2Path()
    the v1beta2 API for Cloud Pub/Sub is deprecated.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.AvroSource.createForSubrangeOfFile(String, long, long)
    Used by Dataflow worker
    org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.Coder.decode(InputStream, Coder.Context)
    only implement and call Coder.decode(InputStream)
    org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.Coder.encode(T, OutputStream, Coder.Context)
    only implement and call Coder.encode(Object value, OutputStream)
    org.apache.beam.sdk.testing.PAssert.PCollectionContentsAssert.equals(Object)
    Object.equals(Object) is not supported on PAssert objects. If you meant to test object equality, use a variant of PAssert.PCollectionContentsAssert.containsInAnyOrder(T...) instead.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.values.PValue.expand()
    A PValue always expands into itself. Calling PValue.expand() on a PValue is almost never appropriate.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.WithTimestamps.getAllowedTimestampSkew()
    This method permits a to elements to be emitted behind the watermark. These elements are considered late, and if behind the allowed lateness of a downstream PCollection may be silently dropped. See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-644 for details on a replacement.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.DoFn.getAllowedTimestampSkew()
    This method permits a DoFn to emit elements behind the watermark. These elements are considered late, and if behind the allowed lateness of a downstream PCollection may be silently dropped. See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-644 for details on a replacement.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.gcp.bigtable.BigtableIO.Read.getBigtableOptions()
    will be replaced by bigtable options configurator.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.gcp.bigtable.BigtableIO.Write.getBigtableOptions()
    will be replaced by bigtable options configurator.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.CoderRegistry.getCoder(Class<? extends T>, Class<T>, Map<Type, ? extends Coder<?>>, TypeVariable<?>)
    This method is to change in an unknown backwards incompatible way once support for this functionality is refined.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.CoderRegistry.getCoder(TypeDescriptor<OutputT>, TypeDescriptor<InputT>, Coder<InputT>)
    This method is to change in an unknown backwards incompatible way once support for this functionality is refined.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.values.PCollectionView.getCoderInternal()
    this method will be removed entirely. The PCollection underlying a side input, including its Coder, is part of the side input's specification with a ParDo transform, which will obtain that information via a package-private channel.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.Source.getDefaultOutputCoder()
    Override Source.getOutputCoder() instead.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.PTransform.getDefaultOutputCoder()
    Instead, the PTransform should explicitly call PCollection.setCoder(org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.Coder<T>) on the returned PCollection.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.PTransform.getDefaultOutputCoder(InputT)
    Instead, the PTransform should explicitly call PCollection.setCoder(org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.Coder<T>) on the returned PCollection.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.PTransform.getDefaultOutputCoder(InputT, PCollection<T>)
    Instead, the PTransform should explicitly call PCollection.setCoder(org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.Coder<T>) on the returned PCollection.
    org.apache.beam.runners.dataflow.util.MonitoringUtil.getJobMonitoringPageURL(String, String)
    this method defaults the region to "us-central1". Prefer using the overload with an explicit regionId parameter.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.CoderRegistry.getOutputCoder(SerializableFunction<InputT, OutputT>, Coder<InputT>)
    This method is to change in an unknown backwards incompatible way once support for this functionality is refined.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.values.PCollectionView.getTagInternal()
    this method will be removed entirely. The PCollection underlying a side input, is part of the side input's specification with a ParDo transform, which will obtain that information via a package-private channel.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.View.CreatePCollectionView.getView()
    This should not be used to obtain the output of any given application of this PTransform. That should be obtained by inspecting the TransformHierarchy.Node that contains this View.CreatePCollectionView, as this view may have been replaced within pipeline surgery.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.values.PCollectionView.getViewFn()
    this method will be removed entirely. The ViewFn for a side input is an attribute of the side input's specification with a ParDo transform, which will obtain this specification via a package-private channel.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.values.PCollectionView.getWindowingStrategyInternal()
    this method will be removed entirely. The PCollection underlying a side input, including its WindowingStrategy, is part of the side input's specification with a ParDo transform, which will obtain that information via a package-private channel.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.testing.PAssert.PCollectionContentsAssert.hashCode()
    Object.hashCode() is not supported on PAssert objects.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.windowing.WindowFn.isCompatible(WindowFn<?, ?>)
    please override verifyCompatibility to throw a useful error message; we will remove isCompatible at version 3.0.0
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.DoFn.prepareForProcessing()
    use DoFn.Setup or DoFn.StartBundle instead. This method will be removed in a future release.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.gcp.bigquery.BigQueryIO.read()
    Use BigQueryIO.read(SerializableFunction) or BigQueryIO.readTableRows() instead. BigQueryIO.readTableRows() does exactly the same as BigQueryIO.read(), however BigQueryIO.read(SerializableFunction) performs better.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.Pipeline.setCoderRegistry(CoderRegistry)
    this should never be used - every Pipeline has a registry throughout its lifetime.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.AvroIO.Write.to(DynamicAvroDestinations<T, ?, T>)
    Use FileIO.write() or FileIO.writeDynamic() instead.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.AvroIO.TypedWrite.to(DynamicAvroDestinations<UserT, NewDestinationT, OutputT>)
    Use FileIO.write() or FileIO.writeDynamic() instead.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.TextIO.Write.to(FileBasedSink.DynamicDestinations<String, ?, String>)
    Use FileIO.write() or FileIO.writeDynamic() ()} with TextIO.sink() instead.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.TextIO.TypedWrite.to(FileBasedSink.DynamicDestinations<UserT, NewDestinationT, String>)
    Use FileIO.write() or FileIO.writeDynamic() with TextIO.sink() instead.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.TextIO.Write.to(SerializableFunction<String, DefaultFilenamePolicy.Params>, DefaultFilenamePolicy.Params)
    Use FileIO.write() or FileIO.writeDynamic() ()} with TextIO.sink() instead.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.TextIO.TypedWrite.to(SerializableFunction<UserT, DefaultFilenamePolicy.Params>, DefaultFilenamePolicy.Params)
    Use FileIO.write() or FileIO.writeDynamic() with TextIO.sink() instead.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.CountingSource.unbounded()
    use GenerateSequence instead
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.CountingSource.unboundedWithTimestampFn(SerializableFunction<Long, Instant>)
    use GenerateSequence and call GenerateSequence.withTimestampFn(SerializableFunction) instead
    org.apache.beam.sdk.options.ValueProviders.updateSerializedOptions(String, Map<String, String>)
    Use TestPipeline.newProvider(T) for testing ValueProvider code.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.CountingSource.upTo(long)
    use GenerateSequence instead
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.WithTimestamps.withAllowedTimestampSkew(Duration)
    This method permits a to elements to be emitted behind the watermark. These elements are considered late, and if behind the allowed lateness of a downstream PCollection may be silently dropped. See https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-644 for details on a replacement.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.gcp.bigtable.BigtableIO.Read.withBigtableOptions(BigtableOptions.Builder)
    will be replaced by bigtable options configurator.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.gcp.bigtable.BigtableIO.Write.withBigtableOptions(BigtableOptions.Builder)
    will be replaced by bigtable options configurator.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.gcp.bigtable.BigtableIO.Read.withBigtableOptions(BigtableOptions)
    will be replaced by bigtable options configurator.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.gcp.bigtable.BigtableIO.Write.withBigtableOptions(BigtableOptions)
    will be replaced by bigtable options configurator.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.TextIO.Read.withCompressionType(TextIO.CompressionType)
    Use TextIO.Read.withCompression(org.apache.beam.sdk.io.Compression).
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.TextIO.ReadAll.withCompressionType(TextIO.CompressionType)
    Use TextIO.ReadAll.withCompression(org.apache.beam.sdk.io.Compression).
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.TFRecordIO.Read.withCompressionType(TFRecordIO.CompressionType)
    Use TFRecordIO.Read.withCompression(org.apache.beam.sdk.io.Compression).
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.TFRecordIO.Write.withCompressionType(TFRecordIO.CompressionType)
    use TFRecordIO.Write.withCompression(org.apache.beam.sdk.io.Compression).
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.xml.XmlIO.Read.withCompressionType(XmlIO.Read.CompressionType)
    use XmlIO.Read.withCompression(org.apache.beam.sdk.io.Compression).
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.TextIO.TypedWrite.withFormatFunction(SerializableFunction<UserT, String>)
    Use FileIO.write() or FileIO.writeDynamic() with TextIO.sink() instead.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.io.FileIO.Write.withIgnoreWindowing()
    Avoid usage of this method: its effects are complex and it will be removed in future versions of Beam. Right now it exists for compatibility with WriteFiles.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.View.AsMap.withSingletonValues()
    this method simply returns this AsMap unmodified
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    org.apache.beam.runners.dataflow.options.DataflowPipelineWorkerPoolOptions.AutoscalingAlgorithmType.BASIC
    use DataflowPipelineWorkerPoolOptions.AutoscalingAlgorithmType.THROUGHPUT_BASED.
